mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.exportsname,b.name deptName,a.exports_level FROM (select id,exportsname,exports_level,work_unit,exports_major FROM i6rlc_experts_annual_assessment where exportsassess_year = #{annual} AND assessment_type =#{assessment_type} AND assessment_content = '所在公司' ) a INNER JOIN (select name,id from i4l46_work_unit where id = #{work_unit}) b ON a.work_unit = b.id

SELECT a.id,a.exportsname,b.name deptName,a.exports_level FROM (select id,exportsname,exports_level,work_unit,exports_major FROM i6rlc_experts_annual_assessment where exportsassess_year = #{annual} AND assessment_type =#{assessment_type} AND assessment_content = '局评委会') a INNER JOIN (select name,id from i4l46_work_unit where 1=1) b ON a.work_unit = b.id
mapper.update: update i6rlc_financial_audit_annual set work_achievement = null,topic_research = null,study_train = null,echange_teach = null,total_score = null where parentId = #{parentId}
update i6rlc_engineer_technology_annual set review_discussion = null,poser_field_service = null,train_teaching = null,technology_innovate = null,total_score = null where parentId = #{parentId}
update i6rlc_engineer_economy_annual set solve_problems = null,construction_promotion = null,special_events = null,culture_teaching = null,total_score = null where parentId = #{parentId}
mapper.select: SELECT expert_ann_score,expert_ann_apply,row_id,AVG(work_achievement),AVG(topic_research),AVG(study_train),AVG(echange_teach),AVG(finance_total)FROM i6rlc_expert_ann_score_detail where expert_ann_score =#{id} GROUP BY expert_ann_apply

SELECT expert_ann_score,expert_ann_apply,row_id,AVG(review_discussion),AVG(poser_field_service),AVG(train_teaching),AVG(technology_innovate),AVG(engineer_tech_total)FROM i6rlc_expert_ann_score_detail where expert_ann_score =#{id} GROUP BY expert_ann_apply

SELECT expert_ann_score,expert_ann_apply,row_id,AVG(solve_problems),AVG(construction_promotion),AVG(special_events),AVG(culture_teaching),AVG(engineer_economic_total)FROM i6rlc_expert_ann_score_detail where expert_ann_score =#{id} GROUP BY expert_ann_apply
